description: The fallout from a group chat in which Trump administration officials discussed sensitive military plans that inadvertently included a journalist continued to dominate Washington.
title: Washington grapples with growing group chat fallout: From the Politics Desk

description: Lawyers for the man accused of gunning down UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson gave him clothes for a hearing that included a hidden heart-shaped note touting his public support, prosecutors said Tuesday.
title: Hidden heart-shaped notes were found in Luigi Mangione's socks, prosecutors say

description: President Donald Trump said Wednesday evening he might give China "a little reduction in tariffs" if its government approves a TikTok deal his administration brokered.
title: Trump floats tariff reduction if China agrees to TikTok deal

description: Nearly 40 Spanish-language TikTok accounts, several even posing as Telemundo and Univision, spread falsehoods and remained undetected for at least a month.
title: How a TikTok network spreading Spanish-language immigration misinformation gained traction

description: The family of a woman who was strangled last year on an overnight visit with her husband at a California prison said Wednesday that such visits should be suspended until officials can figure out how to prevent similar tragedies.
title: Family of woman strangled during overnight prison visit calls for suspending them

description: A New Jersey police chief has been accused by five of his officers of turning the department into an "Animal House" rife with harassment against his employees, including incidents of him defecating on the office floor, spiking the office coffee pot with Adderall and Viagra, and jabbing one officer in the penis with a hypodermic needle.
title: N.J. police chief accused of turning department into 'Animal House'

description: Warning: This article contains spoilers for the show “Severance.”
title: 'Severance' star Dichen Lachman has seen your fan theories. This is the wildest one, she says.

description: A federal appeals court today denied the administration's bid to lift U.S. District Judge James Boasberg's order banning it from using the president's invocation of the Alien Enemies Act to deport alleged Venezuelan gang members.
title: Appeals court denies Trump admin request to temporarily resume Alien Enemies Act deportations

description: Lewelyn Dixon, a University of Washington lab technician and green card holder, was recently detained by U.S.
title: Family calls for release of woman legally in U.S. for 50 years and now detained by ICE

description: Tufts University and a lawyer say Immigration and Customs Enforcement took Rumeysa Ozturk, a Turkish national who was maintaining a valid F-1 student visa as a doctoral student, into custody.
title: Video shows arrest of Tufts University graduate student

description: Senate Republicans are warming up to the idea of including a debt ceiling increase in their big party-line bill to advance President Donald Trump’s agenda.
title: Senate Republicans warm to hiking the debt limit in their sweeping party-line bill

description: Joel Collier was fired from the Salvation Army a decade ago after sending graphic sexual messages to a child — only to be rehired the next year and accused of sexually abusing a teenager, according to a lawsuit.
title: Salvation Army dismissed warnings, allowing a music director to abuse a girl for years, lawsuit says

description: President Donald Trump is expected to announce new measures imposing tariffs on automobiles Wednesday afternoon.
title: Trump expected to announce new auto tariffs Wednesday afternoon

description: TikTok creator Joshua Blackledge, best known for his car content that he shared with his more than 1 million followers, has died.
title: Joshua Blackledge, TikTok star from North Carolina, dies at 16

description: The CDC is expected to hand over multiple sets of vaccine safety data to a discredited researcher with a history of spreading misinformation that vaccines cause autism.
title: HHS taps anti-vaccine activist to look at debunked links between autism and vaccines, sources say

description: FKA Twigs announced she's "heartbroken" to axe her upcoming North American tour dates due to visa issues.
title: FKA Twigs cancels tour dates in North America over visa issues

description: The former top federal prosecutor in Virginia’s Eastern District suffered from epilepsy and died in her sleep last weekend, her family said Wednesday.
title: Former U.S. attorney found dead had epilepsy and died in her sleep, family says

description: Alec Baldwin's movie "Rust," which was plagued by controversy in 2021 following the fatal on-set shooting of cinematographer Halyna Hutchins, will be released in May.
title: 'Rust' movie trailer released 4 years after cinematographer Halyna Hutchins' on-set death

description: Watch live coverage as President Trump delivers remarks on women's history month at a White House event.
title: Trump delivers remarks at Women's History Month event

description: Chinese tea chain Chagee filed for a U.S. initial public offering on Tuesday, seeking to trade on the Nasdaq using the ticker “CHA.”
title: Chinese tea chain Chagee files for U.S. initial public offering

description: The newly confirmed director of the Federal Housing Finance Agency, Bill Pulte, who oversees mortgage giants Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac, said he will not lower the conforming loan limit, or the maximum value for the loans the two firms will buy and guarantee.
title: Federal housing agency will not cut Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac loan limits, new director says

description: Dollar Tree said Wednesday that it’s gaining market share with higher-income consumers and could raise prices on some products to offset President Donald Trump’s tariffs.
title: Dollar Tree says it's winning over higher-income shoppers and may offset tariffs with price hikes

description: Around 9.7 million student loan borrowers became past due on their bills after the Covid-era payment pause expired, according to a new estimate by the Federal Reserve Bank of New York.
title: Over 9 million student loan borrowers past due after bills restarted, Fed estimates

description: Mortgage rates barely budged last week, but homebuyers may be inching back to the market despite strong spring headwinds.
title: Mortgage demand from homebuyers is strongest in nearly two months, but that's not saying a lot

description: House Democrats’ questioned top intelligence officials over why a journalist was included in a group chat on the messaging app Signal containing plans about military operations in Yemen. NBC News’ Julie Tsirkin reports on how Director of National Intelligence Tulsi Gabbard responded during the hearing on worldwide threats.
title: House Democrats question intel officials over Signal group chat

description: Federal employees from several agencies filed a class action complaint Wednesday, claiming the Trump administration unlawfully fired employees for DEI activities.
title: Federal workers fired in anti-DEI purge say it was because they’re not white men

description: The 2025 MLB season is upon us, and there’s no shortage of storylines.
title: Can the Dodgers be beat? That and more ahead of MLB Opening Day

description: Two intoxicated men have been sentenced to community service and ordered to pay a hefty fine after ripping in half and stealing a statue of Paddington Bear in England.
title: Paddington Bear statue stolen in England, judge scolds thieves as 'antithesis' of beloved character

description: A majority of American voters are generally disappointed with the people President Donald Trump has appointed to posts in his administration, according to an NBC News poll earlier this month — a record share in a question NBC News has measured at the start of four previous administrations.
title: Poll: Majority unhappy with Trump's appointees, as some face heat over group chat

description: Four U.S. soldiers went missing during tactical training in Lithuania, not far from its border with Belarus, the Pentagon said Wednesday.
title: 4 U.S. Army soldiers go missing in Lithuania during training exercise

description: Federal authorities on Tuesday detained a Tufts University graduate student while she was on her way to break her Ramadan fast with friends, the student's lawyer said.
title: Federal immigration authorities detain international Tufts graduate student

description: The Lost Angels Career Center pays students to work and sets them up with careers in aerospace.
title: How a 12-week trade school is launching young people into jobs at NASA

description: The Trump administration’s decision to revoke temporary legal status for thousands of Cuban immigrants is putting Cuban American Republicans in a tough spot.
title: Trump's move to end an immigration program hits a powerful Republican base of voters

description: Elon Musk’s Department of Government Efficiency is moving to downsize the Social Security Administration with office closures, cutbacks on phone services and new rules requiring in-person visits for some prospective beneficiaries to register.
title: Top Republicans say they're out of the loop as DOGE downsizes Social Security Administration

description: More than 8 million people are under red flag warnings on Wednesday, as firefighters continue to fight wildfires in the Carolinas.
title: Over 8 million under red flag warnings as wildfires still rage in the Carolinas

description: Academic groups of professors and scholars have filed a lawsuit against the Trump administration, claiming the arrests of noncitizen students and faculty who participate in pro-Palestinian protests are unconstitutional.
title: Trump admin sued for arresting students and faculty linked to pro-Palestinian protests

description: An investigation was opened into the death of a New York man who was fatally shot following an encounter with Oswego County sheriff's deputies and state police last week.
title: Fatal shooting of New York man killed by Oswego County deputy under investigation

description: The Education Department said its civil rights office is investigating the Portland, Oregon, school system for allowing a trans high school runner to compete in female sports and use girls’ locker rooms.
title: Portland schools face civil rights probe over transgender athlete

description: The Supreme Court has upheld its decision on ghost gun regulations, which was a Biden administration effort to restrict the kits that allow people to obtain parts needed to assemble firearms. NBC News' Laura Jarrett reports on the decision from the conservative-leaning court.
title: Supreme Court upholds ghost gun restrictions

description: The Supreme Court rules on a Biden administration effort to regulate 'ghost gun' kits that allow people to easily obtain parts needed to assemble firearms from online sellers.
title: Supreme Court upholds Biden regulations on 'ghost gun' kits

description: The Atlantic on Wednesday published a transcript of text messages showing that Secretary of Defense Pete Hegseth detailed U.S. military attack plans in Yemen in a Signal group chat that inadvertently included the magazine’s editor-in-chief, Jeffrey Goldberg.
title: The Atlantic publishes full Signal chat showing military plans about strikes in Yemen

description: Oscar winner Hamdan Ballal, his face bruised and clothes still spotted with blood said he was heavily beaten by an Israeli settler and soldiers.
title: Oscar winner Hamdan Ballal says he was beaten by Israeli soldiers during detention

description: A contentious Senate hearing raised more questions about Defense Secretary Hegseth’s decision to share details of a planned U.S. military operation in a group chat.
title: Testimony raises questions about Hegseth’s handling of secrets and sensitive communications

description: Vice President JD Vance said he will join the second lady this week in Greenland, with changes made to a schedule that had sparked anger on the Arctic island.
title: Vance and his wife appease Denmark with change to Greenland visit plans

description: Honey bee colonies in the U.S. are projected to decline by up to 70% in 2025, entomologists at Washington State University said on Tuesday.
title: Scientists warn of severe honey bee losses in 2025

description: President Donald Trump is downplaying the Signal group chat where secret American airstrikes were discussed for days by top officials in the presence of The Atlantic editor-in-chief Jeffrey Goldberg, who was inadvertently invited to the chain. National security adviser Mike Waltz, who says he created the group chat, is now taking "full responsibility" for his actions. NBC’s Garrett Haake reports for TODAY.
title: Trump downplays group chat where military plans were discussed

description: Trump officials downplay group text about military plans. Pause on some green card processing.  New antibiotics for UTI. Baseball's biggest changes in a century.
title: Trump officials downplay group text and FDA approves new UTI antibiotic: Morning Rundown

description: Director of National Intelligence Tulsi Gabbard and CIA Director John Ratcliffe are expected to face more questions about a group chat mishap that leaked plans for military strikes in Yemen.
title: Democrat tells intel officials it's a 'lie' to say info in the chat isn't considered classified

description: A case about a Federal Communications Commission program that subsidizes telecommunications in underserved areas raises big legal questions for other agencies.
title: Supreme Court hears FCC case that could weaken power of federal agencies

description: Anti-Hamas slogans were shouted by some protesters as hundreds of people gathered in northern Gaza to call for an end to the war.
title: Anti-Hamas slogans shouted at Gaza protest against the war in rare show of dissent

description: A network of companies operated by a secretive Chinese tech firm has been trying to recruit recently laid-off U.S. government workers, research shows.
title: Secretive Chinese network tried to lure fired federal workers, research shows

description: Baseball is looking a little different every year as technological innovations, society's shrinking attention span and big money marketing concerns creep into MLB.
title: Baseball was largely unchanged for more than a century — now MLB is trying to shake things up

description: Utah on Tuesday added new protections for the children of online content creators following the child abuse conviction of Ruby Franke, a mother of six who dispensed parenting advice to millions on YouTube before her arrest in 2023.
title: Utah adds protections for child influencers following YouTuber Ruby Franke’s child abuse conviction

description: An Alabama judge heard conflicting testimony on Tuesday about newly released body camera video that captured the moments before a police officer fatally shot an armed Black man outside of his home.
title: New body camera video shows moments before Alabama police fatally shoot armed Black man

description: A longtime, powerful former North Dakota lawmaker, who is scheduled to be sentenced Wednesday for traveling to Europe with the intent to pay for sex with minors.
title: Ex-North Dakota lawmaker to be sentenced for traveling to Europe to pay for sex with minors

description: Wind-driven wildfires that were among South Korea’s worst ever were ravaging the country’s southern regions, killing 18 people, officials said Wednesday.
title: Wildfires ravage southern South Korea, killing 18 people and forcing 27,000 to evacuate

description: A California woman's son is suing Trump International Hotels for alleged negligence, claiming a Trump Hotel Las Vegas door caused her to fall and later die.
title: Woman's son claims Las Vegas Trump hotel's revolving door caused her to fall and later die

description: A lawsuit filed Tuesday alleges that a New York funeral home sent the wrong body for burial in Guatemala last year.
title: Second family sues New York funeral home, claiming wrong body was sent for burial in Guatemala

description: Signal, the most secure widely available messaging app, has become a go-to resource. Its shortcomings are why its use by Pete Hegseth has rocked politics.
title: How the app used by Hegseth in text group can leave the door open for spies and hackers

description: A super PAC tied to billionaire Elon Musk has started spending in two deeply Republican House seats in Florida ahead of next week’s special elections, according to a new campaign finance report.
title: Musk's super PAC jumps into Florida's special elections

description: A Texas district attorney said Tuesday he will no longer pursue the death penalty against the gunman who killed 23 people in a racially motivated attack at an El Paso Walmart in 2019.
title: Texas prosecutor won’t seek death for gunman in 2019 Walmart mass shooting

description: President Donald Trump on Tuesday signed a sweeping executive order attempting a major overhaul of American elections, requiring people to prove their citizenship when they register to vote.
title: Trump signs executive order requiring proof of citizenship to register to vote in federal elections
